entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 1:30 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -15.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26 except minus 21 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26 except minus 21 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
